articles.author: Nick Romano
articles.title: 'Heartstopper' creator on season 3 and expanding from the comic - Entertainment Weekly News
articles.description: "There's so much new stuff that gives us so much to play with in season 3," Alice Oseman tells EW.
articles.content:
Warning: This article contains spoilers from Heartstopper season 2.
Alice Oseman, the young-adult fiction writer and television producer, now sees Netflix's Heartstopper as "very separate" from her … [+8851 chars]
